txt.en: You have discovered the House of Celeborn
You have discovered Galadriel's Garden
You have discovered Celúrlin
The House of Celeborn is the home of the Lord and Lady of Lothlórien.
This pleasant garden is where Galadriel keeps her most unusual and mysterious possession: the Mirror of Galadriel.
Caras Galadhon is the mighty city of the Lord and Lady of the Galadhrim, nestled amid the tall mallorn trees.
You have discovered the Company's Pavillon
This beautiful and ornate fountain is a testament to the artistry of the Elves.
You have discovered Telain Galadhrim
This pavilion is where the Company of the Ring resides during its stay in Lothlórien.
You have discovered Telain Bangad
You have discovered Telain Melthin
This series of flets is the centre of learning in Caras Galadhon.
You have discovered Telain Glorelloth
Telain Bangad and their sister flets, Telain Melthin, are the centre of trade in Lothlórien.
You have discovered Telain Neduil
Telain Melthin and their sister flets, Telain Bangad, are the centre of trade in Lothlórien.
This series of flets is a popular gathering place among the Galadhrim.
Telain Neduil has a far view of the eastern landscapes of Lothlórien.
NOT USED
Caras Galadhon TBD
City of the Lord and Lady
